description:
小编导读：圣诞节对《唐顿庄园》的剧迷们来说是个悲伤的节日。在英国首播的圣诞特辑将是该剧的大结局，美国观众要过段时间才能看到。但是，《唐顿庄园》大结局会更多的体现粉丝们关注的部分。剧迷们期待的爱情故事、欢乐大团圆以及感人的告别等剧情都会在第六季出现。一起来看看圣诞特辑吧！

1. Rose Is Back -- Rose (Lily James) left for America with Atticus (Matt Barber) at the end of “Downton Abbey” Season 5, but she’ll come home for the holidays. “It was amazing going back after a break,” James told the U.K. edition of Harper’s Bazaar. “You are just totally reinspired by the wonder of it, that grand house against gray skies and all the friends you haven’t seen in so long.”1. 罗斯回归——第五季结束时，罗斯（莉莉·詹姆斯饰）和阿提克斯（马特·巴伯饰）去了美国，但她会回来过圣诞节的。“小憩之后回归的感觉棒呆了，”詹姆斯告诉英国版《时尚芭莎》，“我完全被这个事实惊呆了，我又能回到那个灰色天空下的宏伟建筑，还能见到许久未见的老朋友。”

2. Sisterly Bonding -- Will “Downton Abbey” conclude with Mary (Michelle Dockery) and Edith (Laura Carmichael) getting along at last? The synopsis teased that Edith may finally come clean in the series finale.2. 姊妹羁绊——《唐顿庄园》会以玛丽（米歇尔·道克瑞饰）和伊迪丝（劳拉·卡尔迈克尔饰）的和睦相处迎来尾声吗？剧情梗概中说道：大结局中，伊迪丝可能会承认这一切（之前一直暗中作梗）。

3. A Possible Wedding -- Edith just might be heading down the aisle. A prop wedding program was found, and it supposedly revealed that Edith is marrying Bertie (Harry Hadden-Paton). The Wrap reported that his mother (Patricia Hodge) was cast for the series finale, and it seems unlikely a new face would be introduced in the last episode without a good reason. A wedding would definitely make his mother a necessary character.3. 可能的婚礼——伊迪丝可能要踏上红毯啦。有人看到了婚礼道具，应该是意味着伊迪丝将要嫁给贝蒂（哈利·海登·普顿饰）了。据Wrap报道，贝蒂的母亲（帕瑞卡·霍杰）将会出现在剧终集中；若非因为喜事，最后一集中不大可能引入新角色的。只有婚礼才需要母亲这个角色。

4. Barrow’s Goodbye -- Barrow’s exit will be an emotional one. Despite all his schemes, it looks like the Downton crew really will miss him. “I arrived as a boy. I leave as a man,” Barrow says.4. 巴洛告别——巴洛的离去将会十分感人。虽然他诡计多端，但好像唐顿庄园的人都会十分想他。“我来的时候是个男孩，离开的时候是个男人，”巴洛说。

5. New Year’s Eve -- The Christmas special will take viewers through to the new year as well. Jim Carter, who plays Carson, already spoiled that the episode would conclude on New Year’s Eve. “All the servants are together in the hall,” Carter told.5. 新年夜——圣诞特辑也会让观众感受到新年的味道。卡孙的扮演者吉米·卡特透露，圣诞特辑的剧情将会以新年夜为背景结束。“所有的仆人都会聚集在大厅中，”卡特说。

6. Possible Open Ending -- Although the “Downton Abbey” series finale is expected to wrap up all the major plotlines, there might still be room for more stories. Showrunner Julian Fellowes confirmed he is writing a script for a continuation on film, but the movie hasn’t gotten the green light to be made yet. “This holds a great deal of interest for me, because I still have more to say with ‘Downton.’ I see this transitioning to film quite well, and I certainly am the person to tell this story.”6. 可能会是开放式结局——尽管《唐顿庄园》剧终集有望穿插起所有情节，但依旧给其他情节留有空间。制作人朱莉安·费罗斯证实，他的剧本为该剧的电影版留有余地，但目前电影版尚未启动。“我对电影版十分期待，因为关于唐顿庄园，我想说的还有很多。我很看好电影版，我会继续为电影做编剧。”
